title: Crack In The Road Exclusive Mix #10: Jewellers
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/jewellersmix.jpg "jewellersmix")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/6984-6984/attachment/jewellersmix)It’s only been a few months and we’re already on to our 10th iteration of our ‘Exclusive Mix’ series. To mark the occasion we have a superb mix from up and coming act [**Jewellers**](http://www.facebook.com/media/set/fbx/?set=a.469268026417.261912.571431417#!/Jewellersmusic). Ranging from classic instrumental hip-hop to African infused pop, the mix is a far cry from the escapist dreamscapes that **[Jewellers](http://www.facebook.com/media/set/fbx/?set=a.469268026417.261912.571431417#!/Jewellersmusic)** produce, but it still manages to highlight some of the more subtle influences found in their work. Check it out bellow and enjoy your Easter Sunday.

The Avalanches – Electricity  
Avey Tare – Lucky 1  
Sun Glitters – Yesterday’s Weakness  
Wu-Tang Clan – Can It Be All So Simple  
Gil-Scott Heron & Jamie XX – I’m New Here  
Passion Pit – Little Secrets (Moths Remix)  
Bonobo – Kiara  
Toro Y Moi – Thanks Vision  
RJD2 – Work  
Panda Bear – Surfer’s Hymn  
Four Tet – Plastic People  
The Morning Benders – Cold War (Star Slinger Remix)  
Gold Panda – Marriage  
J Dilla – Waves  
Caribou – Lalibela  
Amadou & Mariam – Sabali

[Crack In The Road Exclusive Mix #10: Jewellers](http://www.mixcloud.com/crackintheroad/crack-in-the-road-exclusive-mix-10-jewellers/?utm_source=widget&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=base_links&utm_term=cloudcast_link) by [Crackintheroad](http://www.mixcloud.com/crackintheroad/?utm_source=widget&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=base_links&utm_term=profile_link) on [Mixcloud](http://www.mixcloud.com/?utm_source=widget&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=base_links&utm_term=homepage_link)
